Class Product

java.lang.Object
  Product
Direct Known Subclasses:
Coffee, CoffeeBrewer
public class Product
extends Object

This class models a product sold by the Gourmet Coffee store. It contains the following information:

  1. the code of the product, a String
  2. a short description of the product, a String
  3. the price of the product, a double

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
author name
